question:
Consider the following products:
  1. Nakshi Kantha
  2. E. I. Leather
  3. Sujini Embroidery Work
  4. Ilkal Sarees
  5. Aranmula Kannadi
Which among the following is the correct set of the states producing the above products respectively?
option1: West Bengal, Uttar Pradesh, Rajasthan, Karnataka, Kerala
option2: Bihar, Tamil nadu, West Bengal, Andhra Pradesh, Kerala
option3: West Bengal, Tamil Nadu, Bihar, Karnataka, Kerala
option4: Assam, Uttar Pradesh, Bihar, Kerala, Kerala
answer: West Bengal, Tamil Nadu, Bihar, Karnataka, Kerala
